law.text:
As used in this section and KRS 45A.035, 45A.095, and 45A.645:
"Agricultural product" means any unprocessed farm product raised or produced as a result of being in the business of "agriculture", as defined by KRS 246.010. "Agricultural product" does not include tobacco; and
"Kentucky-grown agricultural product" means any agricultural product raised or produced in Kentucky.
law.history: Created 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 344, sec. 1, effective July 15, 2002.
